rj.tools.jcsc.rules
Class RulesHandler

java.lang.Object
  rj.tools.jcsc.rules.RulesHandler
public class RulesHandler
extends java.lang.Object

RulesHandler is a helper class which is resoponsibel for saving the rules properties.

__0.98.1__
